name: Skill Fantasy
description:
My game project that I'm working for a week. In the current state, it is only a procgen terrain demo in ascii, and the world is limited to 128x128 tiles, but I will expand the game soon.

Source: https://github.com/Rafael-Dev-21/skill-fantasy

My Channel: https://youtube.com/channel/UCxJf-i1jIPZMrB7sp6RWIHw
